mapper.sql: id, productnum, producttype, productname, snapshot, realpic, structtype, traintype, remark, platform, provider, wj, bzgd, cz, weight, lgjzdjj, zczjj, ngbcd, jxhz, plhz, xtgd, lgzxj, gtqtwj, klx, yzl, jxgd, cd, kd, gd, zpcc, zongxgd, zpcd, zhouxgd, kz, zdhz, cxgd, ysg, cxhz, syhz, gangd, vxjd, zyg, hxgd, zhij
mapper.select:
select
distinct
t.*, t1.name as traintypename, t2.name as platformname from t_e_product t left join t_e_category t1 on t1.code = traintype left join t_e_category t2 on t2.code = platform
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT DISTINCT pt.* FROM t_e_product p LEFT JOIN t_e_producttype pt ON p.producttype = pt.producttype
ORDER BY pt.producttype ASC

select t.*, t1.name as traintypename, t2.name as platformname from t_e_product t left join t_e_category t1 on t1.code = traintype left join t_e_category t2 on t2.code = platform where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
